social_energy.name: Social Battery
social_energy.description: Represents how socially receptive or withdrawn the NPC is at the moment. Affected by frequency of interactions, friendliness of players.

scores.low: Avoidant, curt, doesn't want to talk.

trust_in_others.name: Trust in Others
trust_in_others.description: Reflects the NPC’s overall faith in players as a group. Affected by whether players complete missions honestly or betray.

scores.high: Willing to delegate tasks and share secrets.

emotional_stability.name: Emotional Stability; Patience
emotional_stability.description: Measures whether the NPC is calm and rational or reactive and volatile. Affected by mission failures, overwhelming task load, or friendly gestures.

scores.low: Easily frustrated or mood swings; sarcastic or explosive.

motivation.name: Motivation
motivation.description: Indicates how driven the NPC is to work, forge, train, or contribute to their trade. Boosted by praise, gifts, mission usefulness. Dropped by disrespect.

scores.low: Burnt out, disinterested, may avoid or delay tasks.
scores.high: Hyper-focused, offers extra missions, improves quality.

pride.name: Pride
pride.description: Determines how confident and self-important the NPC feels. Affected by recognition, being outperformed by players, mockery, or compliments.

attachment_to_others.name: Attachment to Others
attachment_to_others.description: Reflects the NPC’s collective emotional bond to players in general. Boosted by consistent kindness, shared success. Lowered by insults, abandonment.

scores.low: Views players as tools or pests.
scores.neutral: Sees them as collaborators or acquaintances.
scores.high: Feels kinship, affection, or loyalty to players.
